author: Griffin Connolly, Griffin Connolly
title: Coronavirus: FBI director warns of potential for spike in hate crimes as anti-Asian incidents surge
description: Christopher Wray alerts law enforcement around the country to the 'potential' for an uptick in hate crimes against Asian-Americans amid the coronavirus pandemic
content: The FBI has taken note of the recent surge in anti-Asian sentiment in the US both online and in reported incidents since the outbreak of coronavirus here in January, and has alerted local law enforcement entities around the country to be mindful and responsiv… [+4423 chars]
